name: Termina
description:
Termina is a fantasy, fast-paced, challenging, roguelike shooter. Explore the creature-filled open world of Termina and collect loads of items and powerups, attempt to defeat the evils of the land and the Timekeeper himself before the day ends and the time loop resets.

Gameplay
Termina is a 2d top-down shooter with Rogue-like elements, in which the player must beat the game within 24 in-game hours. players will find many treasures that change the super shotguns functionality giving them incredible abilities and enabling the player to fight off droves of mysterious creatures, discover secrets, and beat some bosses along the way.

Key Features:
- Multiple boss fights
- Open world
- A bunch of achievements
- upgrades and shops
